actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Security and Terrorism.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1751 of title 18, United States Code, dealing with Presidential assassination, kidnapping, and assault.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to direct the Federal Bureau of Investigation to request Federal, State, and local law enforcement agencies to report promptly to the Bureau and the Secret Service all arrests or other incidents involving the possession or use of a firearm in the vicinity or expected vicinity of the President or a Presidential candidate, under circumstances that do not exclude the possibility that the firearm might have been for the purpose of a Presidential assassination.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1751 of title 18, United States Code, dealing with Presidential assassination, kidnapping, and assault.
